# upstream

**Instance Property**

The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

## Declaration

```swift
let upstream: Upstream
```

## Inspecting publisher properties

- **predicate**: The predicate closure used to evaluate whether two elements are duplicates.

items.description: The predicate closure used to evaluate whether two elements are duplicates.
